translations.translation: and shown him the two highways?
And showed him two highways (of good and evil)?
And did We not show him the two highroads (of good and evil)?
Have We not shown him the ways of good and evil?
And did We not guide him to the two elevated things?
And shown him the two ways
And pointed out to him the two conspicuous ways?
and guided him on the two highways?
And guide him to the parting of the mountain ways?
and shown him the two paths?
And shown Unto him the two highways?
and shown him the two paths [of good and evil]?
And shown him the two highways?
And shown him the two ways (good and evil)?
and guided him on the two paths (of good and evil)?
And We showed him the two ways?
And have shown him the two ways?
[90:10] and guided him to the two paths?, [did We not] point out to him the path of good and that of evil?
(And guide him to the parting of the mountain ways?) And We showed him the way of goodness and the way of evil; and it is also that this means: the way to the two breasts.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَهَدَيْنَاهُ ٱلنَّجْدَينِ } معناه بيّنا له طَريقَ الخَيرِ وطَريقَ الشَّرِ
 ويقال: طَريقَ الثَّديينِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بالجملة: { هَدَيْنَاهُ } بإعطاء هذه النعم العظام { ٱلنَّجْدَينِ } [البلد: 10] أي: طريقي الخير والشر، والهداية والضلال، واختبرناه بهما وابتليناه أيّ طريق يختار لنفسه بعدما وفقناه لكليهما ونبهناه عليهما؟!
